Class VipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.UserController
      • controllers.VipController

  • public class VipController
extends UserController
    Controller for Vips. Contains functionality exclusive to vips.

      • uninterestedInEvent

        public java.lang.String uninterestedInEvent(UserManager userManager,
                                            java.util.UUID eventToRemove)
        As the user has no interests in the event, remove it from the favourite events of the user
        Parameters:
        userManager - The UserManager to use.
        eventToRemove - id of the event to be removed
        Returns:
        a string indicating whether the event was removed or it wasn't there at all

      • interestedInEvent

        public java.lang.String interestedInEvent(UserManager userManager,
                                          java.util.UUID eventToAdd)
        As the user is interested in the event, add it to the favourite events of the user
        Parameters:
        userManager - The UserManager to use.
        eventToAdd - id of the event to be added
        Returns:
        a string indicating whether the event was added or it was the user showing interests twice
